meanings.definition: A man who manages household duties and childcare while his spouse works outside the home.
meanings.sent1: The househusband prepared breakfast for the kids before they went to school.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated her househusband's dedication to taking care of their home.
meanings.sent3: The househusband tried to do laundry but accidentally turned everything pink!
meanings.sent4: Being a househusband turned out to be a challenging yet rewarding experience.
meanings.sent5: The image of a househusband juggling tasks left a lasting impression on her.
